content:
I am a final year CS undergraduate at the Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee. I am broadly in Deep Learning, with applications in Computer Vision and Natural Language Processing.
At IIT Roorkee, I co-lead a Deep Learning-centric discussion group, the Vision and Language Group. I am also working with the Visual Computing Group at Harvard University on Large-Scale Mitochondria Segmentation. Prior to this, I worked on HDR image fusion with the Video Analytics Lab at IISc Bangalore. I also collaborated with Prof. Marco Pedersoli and Professor Jose Dolz in the summer of 2018, working on group-level emotion recognition in images.

title: Aarush Gupta
